response.overview: “My life is a real cemetery of hope,” says the red-haired Ania. At least until he ends up in the home of Maryla and Mateusz, older siblings who wanted to adopt the boy. They called Ania's arrival a terrible mistake by the orphanage authorities. Energetic, inventive and sometimes theatrical Anne quickly wins Mateusz's heart, but Marilla is more strict towards her. Eventually this will change. Ania will have a real home full of love and friendship.
response.title: Anna no Zalkalniem
